bjc789,"2016-02-06T16:24:16.217Z","The Epic Fortrex!","

Awesome set!! But i did think it would have a little more room inside but apart from that, this is the best Nexo Knights set yet!! Also i love the fact that you can add the Merlok'
column2: s Library 2.0 to the Fortrex to make a full blown castle!

column1: The box is your standard large box for sets over £
column2: 70 and the instructions are just one book which i love because it has a proper spine and everything!

column2: s head, the new turret piece and i love that fact that Lego has introduced the new rubber technic pieces to go in the track.

column1: It looks awesome! i do like set set ups and with the rest of the sets it looks awesome!
i love this set. even though it looks unfinished in some places the good things make me overlook them. if your thinking about buying it then i would really recommend it!
